briefdescription.para: Function Name: The A2DP Control path callback type.

detaileddescription.para: The application implements a callback of this type to receive A2DP control path events.

parameterdescription.para: : ID of an event being notified to the app.
: The pointer to data associated with the event.

detaileddescription.para: API to initialize the A2DP SINK component and register with the stack. Called by the application before any other API is called.

parameterdescription.para: : A2DP sink configuration parameters. This should remain valid until deinit is called because the pointer is stored and used inside the library.
: Callback function for receiving sink events..

detaileddescription.para: The API to deregister from the stack and to clean up the memory of the A2DP sink component. Called by the application when the A2DP sink component is no longer needed by it.
The API to configure the preferred codec parameters

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the codec configuration structure.

detaileddescription.para: The API to connect to a peer device. Called by the app to establish an A2DP connection with a peer device.

parameterdescription.para: The Bluetooth device address of the device to which connection is requested.

detaileddescription.para: The API to disconnect the connection from a connected peer device. Called by the application to disconnected from a connected A2DP source.

parameterdescription.para: Connection handle corresponding to the peer device to disconnect from.

detaileddescription.para: The API to start streaming. Called by the application when it wants to indicate the peer to start streaming.

parameterdescription.para: Connection handle corresponding to the peer device. to create a streaming connection.

detaileddescription.para: The API to send a start response on receiving a start request from the peer. Called by the application when it wants to indicate the peer that it is ready to start streaming.

parameterdescription.para: Connection handle corresponding to peer device.
Indicates if start request is accepted(AVDT_SUCCESS) or rejected(AVDT Error codes).

detaileddescription.para: The API to suspend streaming. Called by the application when the streaming is to be suspended.

parameterdescription.para: Connection handle corresponding to the peer device. for which streaming is suspended.

detaileddescription.para: API used to register for data callback. Application provides the SINK configuration data to receive data packets.

parameterdescription.para: Callback function for receiving audio data.

detaileddescription.para: API to send sink delay report to the peer. Called by the app if it supports the sink delay report to report the latency of the audio rendering path.

parameterdescription.para: Connection handle corresponding to peer device to which the delay report is to be sent.

detaileddescription.para: To mute/unmute the audio while streaming. Called by the application to mute an audio when playing music. The application sets this function to unmute, to restart playing music. This api is supported only (in Embedded mode) when app and profile are running on an Infineon BT chip such as 20721.

parameterdescription.para: ramp up/down time in milli seconds

detaileddescription.para: The API to set LRAC switch data. Called by the application to set LRAC Switch Data. This api is supported only (in Embedded mode) when app and profile are running on an Infineon BT chip such as 20721.

parameterdescription.para: The pointer to a buffer that contains LRAC switch data (new A2DP Sink State).

detaileddescription.para: Contains A2DP Sink APIs and definitions.
